title: Person of Interest: Congratulations!
author: Devalorize
comment: That was a funny moment there. That and Fusco saving a supermodel from mobsters. lol
The absurdity of this the reactions of everyone all around, hilarious scene.
Probably one of the best scenes in this episode.
LOL! That scene always makes me laugh!
description: Mr. Reese offers a genuine, heartfelt congratulations to a couple after shooting a man in the back.
